title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC21006 and EC31001Review of the fundamental principals of propagation and antennas. Frequency bands for mobile radio systems. Propagation in free space, over reflecting surface. Effects of atmosphere. Ducting and nonstandard refraction. Propagation over irregular terrain, knife edge diffraction and path loss prediction models. Propagation in built up areas and microcellular systems. Propagation inside buildings. Characterization of multipath phenomenon, short term fading. Statistics of fast fading. Wideband channel characterisation. Basic concepts of antennas. Examples of antennas for wireless systems.
